body: In the past year or two I've noticed the rise of feminism paranoia. The ideology of extreme IFB groups seems to have spread into the mainstream and many are basically saying any time women have any rights at all is radical feminism. Women wearing pants? Feminist. Not thinking a husband should spank his wife? Feminist. Celibate women? Feminist. Women having any share in the pleasure from sexual intercourse? Feminist. Women working? Feminist. Physically strong women? Feminist. Women learning too much or creating too much? Feminist. Women not being whiny spoiled brats who cry at the slightest bit of discomfort? Feminist. Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. Paul too, your favorite person (the real, living, historical Paul, not the fake Roman Paul invented by the church fathers).

Physically strong women? Feminist. Women learning too much or creating too much? Feminist. Women not being whiny spoiled brats who cry at the slightest bit of discomfort? Feminist. Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. Paul too, your favorite person (the real, living, historical Paul, not the fake Roman Paul invented by the church fathers).

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.body: In the past year or two I've noticed the rise of feminism paranoia. The ideology of extreme IFB groups seems to have spread into the mainstream and many are basically saying any time women have any rights at all is radical feminism. Women wearing pants? Feminist. Not thinking a husband should spank his wife? Feminist. Celibate women? Feminist. Women having any share in the pleasure from sexual intercourse? Feminist. Women working? Feminist. Physically strong women? Feminist. Women learning too much or creating too much? Feminist. Women not being whiny spoiled brats who cry at the slightest bit of discomfort? Feminist. Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. Paul too, your favorite person (the real, living, historical Paul, not the fake Roman Paul invented by the church fathers).

Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. author.bio: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.
author.bio_html: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.

body:
Because the women themselves proclaim it to be feminism and the actions and attitudes of modern women can be directly traced back to the goals of the feminist movement.

Why are you such a wicked person? Why do you worship satan? If you'd been around during the time of the Romans you'd be among those who called for the death of christians for no good reason beyond they were christians?

I recommend getting a new hobby, but I don't really know you, maybe this is how you get your jollies. Meh, better yet, stick around, you might learn something.

body:
> Because the women themselves proclaim it to be feminism and the actions and attitudes of modern women can be directly traced back to the goals of the feminist movement.

"Feminism" typically refers to third-wave anti-male feminism that no one but the loony left takes seriously. You probably mean the first and maybe second waves that focused on treating women like actual people. And how is that a bad thing?

> Why are you such a wicked person? Why do you worship satan? If you'd been around during the time of the Romans you'd be among those who called for the death of christians for no good reason beyond they were christians?

When have I ever worshiped Satan? If you think you can discredit me by claiming I worship Satan, you should be reminded of who the Pharisees said worshiped Satan.
body_html:
Because the women themselves proclaim it to be feminism and the actions and attitudes of modern women can be directly traced back to the goals of the feminist movement.

"Feminism" typically refers to third-wave anti-male feminism that no one but the loony left takes seriously. You probably mean the first and maybe second waves that focused on treating women like actual people. And how is that a bad thing?

Why are you such a wicked person? Why do you worship satan? If you'd been around during the time of the Romans you'd be among those who called for the death of christians for no good reason beyond they were christians?

When have I ever worshiped Satan? If you think you can discredit me by claiming I worship Satan, you should be reminded of who the Pharisees said worshiped Satan.

author.bio_html: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.

body:
You want proof of your satan worship while making baseless assumptions that the people in this guild would have called for the death of Paul and Jesus? Hrm, sounds kind of lame. If you can make baseless assumptions so can I. Stop worshiping satan.

The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people", more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time. The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God. Not that you would know that, or that you even care. Your not even a christian, so most of what is said here will not make sense to you anyway, I just don't understand how you can be so bored with yourself that you feel the need to spend so much time harassing good people. Buy some puzzles. Take up wood carving or origami! Oragami is good and cool. I used to do a lot of paper folding back in the day. You might find it therapeutic.

The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people", more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time. The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God. Not that you would know that, or that you even care. Your not even a christian, so most of what is said here will not make sense to you anyway, I just don't understand how you can be so bored with yourself that you feel the need to spend so much time harassing good people. Buy some puzzles. Take up wood carving or origami! Oragami is good and cool. I used to do a lot of paper folding back in the day. You might find it therapeutic.

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

parent.body:
> Because the women themselves proclaim it to be feminism and the actions and attitudes of modern women can be directly traced back to the goals of the feminist movement.

"Feminism" typically refers to third-wave anti-male feminism that no one but the loony left takes seriously. You probably mean the first and maybe second waves that focused on treating women like actual people. And how is that a bad thing?

> Why are you such a wicked person? Why do you worship satan? If you'd been around during the time of the Romans you'd be among those who called for the death of christians for no good reason beyond they were christians?

When have I ever worshiped Satan? If you think you can discredit me by claiming I worship Satan, you should be reminded of who the Pharisees said worshiped Satan.

Because the women themselves proclaim it to be feminism and the actions and attitudes of modern women can be directly traced back to the goals of the feminist movement.

"Feminism" typically refers to third-wave anti-male feminism that no one but the loony left takes seriously. You probably mean the first and maybe second waves that focused on treating women like actual people. And how is that a bad thing?

Why are you such a wicked person? Why do you worship satan? If you'd been around during the time of the Romans you'd be among those who called for the death of christians for no good reason beyond they were christians?

When have I ever worshiped Satan? If you think you can discredit me by claiming I worship Satan, you should be reminded of who the Pharisees said worshiped Satan.

post.body: In the past year or two I've noticed the rise of feminism paranoia. The ideology of extreme IFB groups seems to have spread into the mainstream and many are basically saying any time women have any rights at all is radical feminism. Women wearing pants? Feminist. Not thinking a husband should spank his wife? Feminist. Celibate women? Feminist. Women having any share in the pleasure from sexual intercourse? Feminist. Women working? Feminist. Physically strong women? Feminist. Women learning too much or creating too much? Feminist. Women not being whiny spoiled brats who cry at the slightest bit of discomfort? Feminist. Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. Paul too, your favorite person (the real, living, historical Paul, not the fake Roman Paul invented by the church fathers).

body:
> The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people"

This is correct for right now, in fact women are overly spoiled at the moment. Unfortunately this is the result of primal instincts as the female body is more inherently valuable and scare for reproduction, and nature revolves around reproduction, so it will be pretty much impossible to stop. But historically the men have been jealous of this and oppressed them for revenge, sometimes to the point of literally treating them like property.

> more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time.

This is correct. However you do not seem to be doing so.

> The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God.

The root of the initial waves of feminism was recognizing that envy isn't a valid reason to get revenge on someone, especially if they are not at fault for it (and no one chooses which chromosomes they're born with). Your argument assumes that every woman is identical to Eve, and even if that were true what this basically boils down to is "yeah I did it too but *she started it*!", hardly a valid excuse. If you want to read that much into a creation story which was undoubtedly exaggerated and expanded on over time before being written down, you should consider that it took a devil to deceive the woman but Adam just blindly ate the apple when Eve told him to. I can play this game too. That account has absolutely nothing to do with which chromosome is "more evil" than the other. The only thing it mentions is that men would mostly overpower women as one of the punishments, along arguably even worse consequences for the man.

> Your not even a christian

Yes, I am, and I'm concerned that you don't recognize the good news.
body_html:
The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people"

This is correct for right now, in fact women are overly spoiled at the moment. Unfortunately this is the result of primal instincts as the female body is more inherently valuable and scare for reproduction, and nature revolves around reproduction, so it will be pretty much impossible to stop. But historically the men have been jealous of this and oppressed them for revenge, sometimes to the point of literally treating them like property.

more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time.

This is correct. However you do not seem to be doing so.

The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God.

The root of the initial waves of feminism was recognizing that envy isn't a valid reason to get revenge on someone, especially if they are not at fault for it (and no one chooses which chromosomes they're born with). Your argument assumes that every woman is identical to Eve, and even if that were true what this basically boils down to is "yeah I did it too but she started it!", hardly a valid excuse. If you want to read that much into a creation story which was undoubtedly exaggerated and expanded on over time before being written down, you should consider that it took a devil to deceive the woman but Adam just blindly ate the apple when Eve told him to. I can play this game too. That account has absolutely nothing to do with which chromosome is "more evil" than the other. The only thing it mentions is that men would mostly overpower women as one of the punishments, along arguably even worse consequences for the man.

Your not even a christian

Yes, I am, and I'm concerned that you don't recognize the good news.

parent.body:
You want proof of your satan worship while making baseless assumptions that the people in this guild would have called for the death of Paul and Jesus? Hrm, sounds kind of lame. If you can make baseless assumptions so can I. Stop worshiping satan.

The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people", more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time. The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God. Not that you would know that, or that you even care. Your not even a christian, so most of what is said here will not make sense to you anyway, I just don't understand how you can be so bored with yourself that you feel the need to spend so much time harassing good people. Buy some puzzles. Take up wood carving or origami! Oragami is good and cool. I used to do a lot of paper folding back in the day. You might find it therapeutic.

You want proof of your satan worship while making baseless assumptions that the people in this guild would have called for the death of Paul and Jesus? Hrm, sounds kind of lame. If you can make baseless assumptions so can I. Stop worshiping satan.

The entire root of feminism was never about "treating women like actual people" because women have overwhelmingly been treated as "actual people", more by believers in Christ than any other people since the beginning of time. The root of feminism has always been about breaking down the God created structure between man and woman and started with the serpent telling Eve she could be like God. Not that you would know that, or that you even care. Your not even a christian, so most of what is said here will not make sense to you anyway, I just don't understand how you can be so bored with yourself that you feel the need to spend so much time harassing good people. Buy some puzzles. Take up wood carving or origami! Oragami is good and cool. I used to do a lot of paper folding back in the day. You might find it therapeutic.

post.body: In the past year or two I've noticed the rise of feminism paranoia. The ideology of extreme IFB groups seems to have spread into the mainstream and many are basically saying any time women have any rights at all is radical feminism. Women wearing pants? Feminist. Not thinking a husband should spank his wife? Feminist. Celibate women? Feminist. Women having any share in the pleasure from sexual intercourse? Feminist. Women working? Feminist. Physically strong women? Feminist. Women learning too much or creating too much? Feminist. Women not being whiny spoiled brats who cry at the slightest bit of discomfort? Feminist. Women being anything more than a piece of meat for a man's sexual pleasure and having his kids? Feminist. This is a relatively recent and disturbingly fast-growing development in Christian circles, where is this thought process coming from? If you'd have been around in Jesus's time you'd be among those who crucified him for this reason alone, and believe me this FAR from the only thing you'd take issue with. Paul too, your favorite person (the real, living, historical Paul, not the fake Roman Paul invented by the church fathers).
